page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: {1.MAGHERAGALL METHODIST CHURCH,Glenavy Rd..Rathlin.Built 1837.Minister-REV. T.H.Holloway.Has a hall (built 1967) but no graveyard. {2.MAGHERAGALL PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH, School Lane,Ballycarrickmaddy.Built 1846.Minister-Rev.Larmour lives in nearby manse. Has a graveyard and Hastings Memorial hall (built 1935) This hall is used for Sunday School, Church groups and Girls and Boys Brigade meetings. {3.ST. JOSEPH'S R.C.CHURCH, Kilcorig. Built in 19th cent.Priest-Canon Cunningham who is responsible mainly for the R.C. Church in Lisburn.Has a graveyard but no hall. An adjacent derelict building was,until 1960's,used as a school. Church of Ireland parishoners in the area attend Magheragall Parish Church just to the South of D-Block.
